title: Catechismus paruus pueris primùm Latinè qui ediscatur, proponendus in scholis.
author: Church of England.
notes: The so-called Shorter catechism, a translation of the Church of England catechism from the "Book of common prayer".
Dedication signed: A.N., i.e. Alexander Nowell, the translator into Latin and the chief author of the original catechism.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
